content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x)

### Iron plate production setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Assembling machine (position y) for crafting iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position z) that puts iron plates into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position a) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position y

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
